name: Savant Pharmacy
comment:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • medication placed in pill organizers (containers for storing scheduled doses) for a set fee
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses) for a set fee
  • pharmacist available for diabetes management consultations
  • mobility aids (crutch rental, canes and crutches for sale)
  • free delivery for prescriptions
  • free seasonal flu vaccines
  • free take-home naloxone kits (emergency response kits for opioid overdose)

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Medications Return Program - Safe disposal of expired or unused medications, creams, and inhalers

Sharps Disposal Program - Safe disposal of syringes, pen needles, lancets, insulin pump infusion supplies, and test strips
serviceProvisionCode: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP

description_of_this:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • medication placed in pill organizers (containers for storing scheduled doses) for a set fee
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses) for a set fee
  • pharmacist available for diabetes management consultations
  • mobility aids (crutch rental, canes and crutches for sale)
  • free delivery for prescriptions
  • free seasonal flu vaccines
  • free take-home naloxone kits (emergency response kits for opioid overdose)

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Medications Return Program - Safe disposal of expired or unused medications, creams, and inhalers

Sharps Disposal Program - Safe disposal of syringes, pen needles, lancets, insulin pump infusion supplies, and test strips, Codes: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP, Features: Partially Accessible, Languages: English, Arabic, Gujarati, Hindi, Marathi, Address: 200 Highland Rd W, Unit 4, Kitchener, ON, N2M 3C2, Location: lat: 43.4411, lon: -80.5067
